title: "2019 Ezreal" - Melee Spellslinger. ( NOT AN EZREAL REWORK )
body:
Just to start off, most of the things you'll be seeing are probably already done.
However let it be known it's obvious Riot isn't shy of duplicating abilities.
Pyke / Pantheon.
Miss Fortune / Gangplank / Ezreal.
Nidalee / Zoe.
Etc. 

______________________

Ezreal is a skillshot based marksman who does a ton of burst.
He rarely ever crits or auto-attacks.

On the other side, Gangplank is a burst focused point-and-click slight of hand fighter.
He only ever really uses his Q during laning phase or to detonate barrels. 

This is an idea to combine both concepts to make a melee ranger without remaking old Kayle.

Passive: 

Auto-attacking a champion marks them, making your next ability do ( 20% AP ) bonus physical damage. 
Abilities also mark as well, making your next auto attack on the champion deal ( 15% tAD ) bonus magic damage.

Q:  ~80/85/90/95/100 mana
20/18/16/14/12 sec cooldown.

Shoot out a bullet which does not miss by any means, dealing ( 110% bAD ) ( 40% AP ) magic damage.
Mana cost and 75% of the cooldown is refunded if the target hit was auto-attacked. 

_This projectile starts off very slowly and gradually speeds up. From 15 ms to 4000 ms within 3 seconds._

W:
40 mana
30/25/20/15/10 sec cooldown.

Heal 10/12/14/16/18% of your missing health ( + 30% AP ) over 5 seconds, and increase auto-attack range by 100.
If you auto-attack during this time, this effect is given in reverse on the enemy hit. 
( 10/12/14/16/18% of enemy missing health ( +30% AP ) magic damage over 5 seconds. ) 

E: 
10% mana
50/40/30/20/10 second cooldown
Disappear and gain 50/60/70/80/90% bonus movement speed for 1 second. 
After reappearing, your next auto attack gains 50 range and knocks both you and the enemy hit back 20 units.

R:
10/8/6 second cooldown.
80/160/320/640/1280 mana.

Dash a short distance, marking the nearest enemy champion.
After 5 seconds without recasting, deal ( 15% AP ) ( 10% bonus AD ) magic damage per stack, ignoring 20/40/60% magic resistance.
This will not go off if you die first.
